text: The prime minister of UAE is a second head of goverment of the United Arab Emirates. == List of officeholders (1971–present) == Picture Name (Birth–Death) Term of office Deputy Prime Minister(s) Notes Took office Left office Time in office 1 Maktoum bin Rashid Al Maktoum (1943–2006) 9 December 1971 30 April 1979 7 years, 137 days Hamdan bin Rashid Al Maktoum (1971–1973) Khalifa bin Zayed Al Nahyan (1973–1977) Hamdan bin Mohammed Al Nahyan (1977–1979) 2 Rashid bin Saeed Al Maktoum (1912–1990) 30 April 1979 7 October 1990 (Died in office) 11 years, 164 days Hamdan bin Mohammed Al Nahyan & Rashid bin Saeed Al Maktoum (1979–1990) (1) Maktoum bin Rashid Al Maktoum (1943–2006) 7 October 1990 4 January 2006 (Died in office) 15 years, 88 days Sultan bin Zayed Al Nahyan (1990–2009) & Hamdan bin Zayed Al Nahyan (1997–2009) 3 Mohammed bin Rashid Al Maktoum (1949–) 11 February 2006 Incumbent 14 years, 267 days Saif bin Zayed Al Nahyan & Mansour bin Zayed Al Nahyan (2009–present) == Other websites == ==References== *
title: Prime Minister of the United Arab Emirates
